job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO setenv NODEBUG yes #.DEV2 setup 64b starver .DEV2 # starver TFG18g #dev # setup gcc # starver dev # SL16j # starver SL16j # SL17d # setup gcc # starver SL17d #TFG17e # setup 64b # starver TFG17e # echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' # if (! $?) then # set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` # set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` # set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` # else set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set f = 1 set l = 5000000 # endif echo "${evtsFile}" set filel = `basename $evtsFile .daq` set output = ${filel}.event.root if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${filel}B.log if ( -r $logFile) exit 0; set muFile = ${filel}.MuDst.root if (-r $muFile) exit 0; # root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(1000,"P2018,useCDV,Tpx,-hitfilt,mtd,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D,evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,KFVertex,CorrX,dEdxCalib","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'","'${filel}.root'")' >& ${logFile} root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(10000,"P2018,useCDV,TpxRaw,TpxClu,-hitfilt,mtd,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D,evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,KFVertex","'${evtsFile}'")' >& ${logFile}
